interests.name: Music Tech
interests.answer1: Expand their Spotify playlists or make their own music to upload.
interests.answer2: Festivals, gigs, and road trip sing-alongs.

interests.name: TV Movie
interests.answer1: Watch the greatest movies of all time or write & direct their own.
interests.answer2: Midday cinema sessions and late night movie marathons.

interests.name: Gaming Tech
interests.answer1: Unlock new achievements in their favourite video games.
interests.answer2: Gaming and connecting with friends from all over the world.

interests.name: Sport Outdoor
interests.answer1: Get outside, be active and maybe complete that marathon.
interests.answer2: Being as active as possible while the days are long.

interests.name: Home Tech
interests.answer1: Complete their home DIY projects so they can show them off.
interests.answer2: Having everyone over for a home cooked meal or a chat by the grill.

facts: Research shows outdoorsy Nans like swimming and hiking equally!
Research shows 37% of gamer nans surveyed are also tall. Interesting,
Research shows every tech-obsessed Grandad surveyed wears glasses. Neat!
Research shows most left-handed grandads surveyed prefer watching sport and movies
Research shows more tech obsessed and gaming uncles are night owls.
Research shows, more vegan uncles are mobile mad.
calculating: Everyone's easy-to-buy-for once I get to know them, loading gifts now.
Get your wrapping paper ready, calculating gift suggestions.
Filling S.N.T.A.'s database with presents for you to pick from.
Confirming the perfect gifts. Checking my list 373...374...375 times.

facts: According to research, the highest percentage of gamers are boyfriends.
21% of all Kiwis surveyed are gamers.
20% of all Kiwis surveyed are tech obsessed.
Only 9% of mums surveyed said they were tech obsessed.
According to research, there's a 65% chance your BFF loves music.
Crushes, boyfriends and girlfriends surveyed love music the most.
47% of all Kiwis surveyed are house proud.
Of everyone surveyed, Mums and Nans are equally house proud.
37% of all Kiwis surveyed are outdoorsy.
46% of Dads surveyed love the great outdoors.
23% of all Kiwis surveyed are mobile mad.
14% of all Nans surveyed are phone obsessed.
22% of all Kiwis I surveyed are sports fans and entertainment enthusiasts.
Bosses are most likely to be sports fans and entertainment enthusiasts.
22% of all Kiwis I surveyed are entertainment enthusiasts.
Bosses are most likely to be entertainment enthusiasts.
Research shows outdoorsy Nans like swimming and hiking equally!
Research shows 37% of gamer nans surveyed are also tall. Interesting.
Research shows every tech-obsessed Grandad surveyed wears glasses. Neat!
Research shows most left-handed grandads surveyed prefer watching sport and movies.
Research shows more tech obsessed and gaming uncles are night owls.
Research shows, more vegan uncles are mobile mad.
Research shows 31% of sport and entertainment enthusiast Aunties believe in astrology too.
Research says 43% of house proud aunties have freckles.
Research shows 40% of house-proud wives have freckles. Hmm…
Research shows 17% of music loving wives are also tall.
Research shows music loving husbands like beach cricket twice as much as beach soccer according to data.
Research shows 63% of house-proud husbands surveyed love animals.
Research shows 61% of gaming nieces have freckles according to the data.
Research shows 73% of music loving nieces think animals are super cute too.
Research shows 31% of outdoorsy nephews have tattoos.
Research shows 63% of tech-obsessed nephews drink coffee.
Research shows more left-handed brothers liked music.
According to research, outdoorsy brothers like hiking more than swimming.
Research shows 28% of sisters surveyed have tattoos. Does mum know?!
Research shows phone-obsessed sisters prefer coffee over tea.
Research shows BFFs with glasses are more likely to be mobile mad.
BFF gamers like coffee more than tea according to research.
Research shows more outdoorsy co-workers like hikes over swims.
Research shows more outdoorsy co-workers like hikes over swims.
Research shows 24% of Mobile Mad bosses also love astrology.
Research shows 24% of bosses surveyed are mobile mad astrology believers.
Research shows more tech-obsessed employees are left handed!
Research shows employees who love music are twice as likely to be introverted according to data!
Of all the cousins surveyed, most liked a combination of music and coffee according to research.
Research shows more left-handed cousins seem to be tech mad.
Research shows more crushes I surveyed are music lovers!
Research shows more tech obsessed crushes say they're night owls.
Research shows mobile mad boyfriends are more likely to wear glasses.
Research shows more boyfriends with tattoos are outdoorsy than music lovers.
Research shows 93% of sport & entertainment enthusiast girlfriends love animals.
A higher percentage of left-handed girlfriends are into the latest tech according to research.
Research shows 62% of daughters love music. Do 62% have good taste though?
Research shows only 6% of outdoorsy daughters surveyed are vegan. Thought it would be more tbh...
Research shows 22% of sport-loving sons rate themselves at beach cricket.
Research shows more gamer sons surveyed are night owls than early risers.
Research shows 70% of house-proud partners surveyed love animals too.
Research shows music loving partners prefer swims to hikes.
Research shows 10% of tech obsessed mums surveyed are vegan. Interesting!
Research shows 38% of mums who love their home have freckles. That's a lot.
Research shows 35% of music loving dads are introverts and 21% are extroverts.
Research shows 50% of mobile-mad dads love animals. Wait til they discover DogTok!

products.name: Oppo Enco Buds
products.description: Enjoy 6 hours of non-stop listening with the OPPO Enco Buds. Have clearer conversations with intelligent call noise reduction, even when in a crowd. Comes with a charging case.

products.name: JBL Wave 100
products.description: Simple, smart, everyday fun with JBL Wave 100 TWS. Powered by JBL Deep Bass sound, these true wireless headphones brighten your day with up to 20 hours of playback.

products.name: JBL T510BT
products.description: Stream powerful JBL Pure Bass sound with JBL Tune 510 BT headphones. Enjoy high quality wireless bluetooth entertainment with up to 35 hours of battery life.

products.name: JBL Live 660NC
products.description: JBL Tune 660 NC Wireless On-ear headphones maintains signature JBL sound with Adaptive Noise Cancelling so you can choose to keep the noise out, or in with smart ambient sound control.

products.name: Logitech UE Boom 3
products.description: A super-portable speaker built for adventure. The BOOM 3 includes 360° sound, deep bass and features the new Magic button, for one-touch music controls. Water-resistant and drop proof.

products.name: Harman Kardon Citation One MK3
products.description: Harman Kardon Citation ONE MKIII is an all-in-one, next generation smart speaker that delivers rich, room-filling sound. Users to enjoy innovative features, including AirPlay and built-in Chromecast.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Buds2 Pro
products.description: Control which sounds come in and which stay out with the new, innovative Galaxy Buds2 Pro. Immerse yourself in the sounds of your choosing, all while connected to the Galaxy Ecosystem.

products.name: Harman Kardon Onyx Studio 7
products.description: Immerse yourself in the rhythm of life with unrivalled acoustic precision. Crafted from premium materials, the Onyx 7 easily blends into your lifestyle and home.

products.name: JBL Partybox On-The-Go
products.description: Turn your party into a karaoke party with the JBL PartyBox On-The-Go speaker. Delivering 100 watts of powerful JBL Pro Sound, it syncs to a dynamic light show. Includes two JBL wireless microphones.

products.name: Apple TV 4K 32 GB (Gen 2)
products.description: 4K High Frame Rate HDR, with Dolby Atmos sound capabilities, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation) delivers a truly cinematic experience to your screen — whether you’re watching sport or a movie.

products.name: Harman Kardon Citation Sub S
products.description: Rich, deep bass in a sleek, compact package. The Harman Kardon Citation Sub S subwoofer delivers best-in-class bass sound for all your favorite movies and music.

products.name: JBL Bar 5.0
products.description: Make your viewing or gaming experience more immersive with JBL Multibeam™ technology and Virtual Dolby Atmos®. Bluetooth lets you enjoy music from your smartphone or tablet too.

products.name: Harman Kardon Citation Multibeam 700
products.description: Elegant, dynamic and powerful. The Harman Kardon Citation MultiBeam™ 700 delivers full virtual surround sound to your TV without the need for extra speakers and wires.

products.name: LG S90QY Soundbar
products.description: Immerse yourself in a phenomenal sound experience with 5.1.3 channels, including the world’s first sound bar with up-firing center channel that lets you hear every note clearly.

products.name: LG C2 OLED 48 TV
products.description: The LG C2 OLED TV packs brighter colours, an advanced processor and a sleeker, slimmer bezel that won’t go unnoticed.

products.name: Astro Folding Headset Stand
products.description: The ASTRO Gaming Headset Stand features a sleek, fold-out design. Compatible with all flat surfaces and ASTRO Gaming headsets.

products.name: Xbox Wireless Controller
products.description: Experience the enhanced comfort of the new Xbox Wireless Controller, featuring a streamlined design and textured grip. Enjoy custom button mapping and up to twice the wireless range.

products.name: Astro A50 Headset for Xbox/PC
products.description: The A50 Wireless Headset for Xbox delivers top-of-the-line acoustics and durability that professional gamers demand with the revolutionary, iconic ASTRO Gaming design.

products.name: Backbone Gaming Controller for iOS
products.description: With Backbone One, next-level gaming has never been more magical and effortless. Just connect the controller to your iPhone, open the app, and instantly start playing games.

products.name: Logitech StreamCam
products.description: Logitech StreamCam features AI-enabled smart auto-focus and exposure, and versatile mounting options so you’re always seen in your best light and at the perfect angle.

products.name: Blue Yeti – Blackout
products.description: Create unparalleled recordings directly on your computer with Blue Microphone's Yeti USB Microphone. Blackout Yeti adds style and energy to your recording or broadcasting setup.

products.name: Logitech G923 Racing wheel and pedals
products.description: Driving Force Racing Wheel features a long lasting, reliable hall-effect steering sensor, using magnetic fields to sense the position of the wheel.

products.name: Apple Airtag
products.description: Keep track of your valuables. Find them by sound when close by, or by the Apple network if they're further away.

products.name: Mophie Snap+ Powerstation Stand
products.description: The magnetic array on the Snap+ Powerstation works with MagSafe compatible devices to give you the stylish, portable on-the-go charge you need.

products.name: Livall Cycling Helmet Phone
products.description: LIVALL BH51M NEO smart and safe urban cycle helmet is a multifunctional lightweight helmet that combines both safety and connectivity.

products.name: Mophie Powerstation Go Rugged Air Compressor
products.description: Power it all with the powerstation go rugged air compressor. This powerstation has interchangeable air nozzles to jump start your car, inflate your tires and keep your devices charged.

products.name: Beats Fit Pro
products.description: The Beats Fit Pro is equipped with comfortable, secure-fit wingtips that flex to fit your ear.

products.name: Arlo Go 2
products.description: Security you can take anywhere, Arlo Go 2 is the perfect solution for 24/7 security in areas without power or WiFi. The Go 2 connects to 4G LTE or directly to WiFi.

products.name: Samsung Watch5 (Pink Gold)
products.description: Wear your health on your sleeve with the new Galaxy Watch5. Featuring personal health data allowing you to track your lifestyle, enhanced durability and a stylish design you can make your own.

products.name: Samsung Watch5 Pro (Black Titanium)
products.description: Up your active lifestyle game with the all-new Galaxy Watch5 Pro. Track your milestones as you navigate the great outdoors with the smartwatch designed to battle the elements.

products.name: Nanoleaf Triangle Smarter Kit (4 pack)
products.description: Nanoleaf Shapes - Triangles are modular LED light panels with a combination of smart technology and sleek ultra-thin design.

products.name: Philips Hue 9W A60 E27 3pc Starter Pack
products.description: Add ambient color to any room with the Philips Hue White and color ambiance starter kit. The kit includes 3 color smart bulbs and a Hue Bridge.

products.name: Apple Homepod Mini
products.description: HomePod mini fills the entire room with 360-degree audio. And Siri, your favourite do-it-all intelligent assistant, controls your smart home privately and securely.

products.name: Arlo Video Doorbell
products.description: With more clarity and a 180° diagonal viewing angle, see a person from head to toe or spot a package at the door. Feel more secure with two way audio, night vision viewing and motion detection.

products.name: Arlo Spotlight Camera
products.description: Providing 130° angle viewing and 1080p recording capability. A weather-resistant design, you can also receive motion alerts straight to your phone. Install wirelessly by connecting to your WiFi.

products.name: Arlo XL Spotlight Camera
products.description: This camera is also wire-free and weather resistant with 1080p resolution. Hear and speak with visitors while getting the security you need using the built-in siren to deter unwanted guests.

products.name: JBL Link View
products.description: Get more than legendary sound. With an integrated display, the JBL LINK VIEW allows you to get things done easily.  It has the Google Assistant built in so you can ask questions and tell it to do things.

products.name: Arlo Ultra 2 4k Camera
products.description: The Arlo Ultra 2 camera helps give peace of mind when you're out and about with 4K resolution, 2-way audio and enhanced night vision.

products.name: Harman Kardon Citation 200
products.description: Powerful, portable smart speaker for HD quality sound. Stream your favourite tunes using Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, and add in speakers for more coverage. Includes Google Assistant.

products.name: Philips Hue Colour Go V2 Lamp
products.description: From a splash of color to a mood-setting centerpiece, the Hue Go lets you set the perfect ambiance. Works as a standalone light or as part of your smart lighting system with the Hue Bridge.

products.name: Gift cards go a long way!
products.description: Chip in for the perfect gift with friends and family or let your loved one pick exactly what they're wishing for. Pick up a gift card at the counter.
